detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Wedge-heel sandals with an ankle-height shaft, open section at the back, ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle and a strap over the foot. Heels and insoles covered in braided jute. Rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm, heel approx. 9 cm.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a turn-down collar, classic front with press-studs and a yoke at the front and back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and elastication with a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Sleeveless body in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a flatlock seam down the back and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Gently fitted jacket in a soft linen and viscose weave with notch lapels and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Jetted front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with a draped effect at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short, lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist.

Sleeveless body in sturdy jersey in a narrow cut at the top with spaghetti shoulder straps that join at the back of the neck and decorative straps at the back. Lining and lower section in glossy jersey. Concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Tube scarf in a soft knit with a wrapover front. Length approx. 34 cm, circumference approx. 55 cm.
Fully lined bikini top in soft velour with removable inserts and no fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with an open section and crossover straps at one shoulder.

Bralette in ribbed jersey with a decorative tie and underwired, mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in patterned stretch cotton satin with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. Ribbing down the shaft and upper section of the foot.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jersey T-shirt.
Pyjama bottoms in a patterned cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly.
Lined triangle bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band.

Baby Exclusive. Two-piece set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with soft elastication at the waist, and overlocked edges at the hems.
Jersey top with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Leather gloves with decorative stitching on the uppers. Soft, knitted lining.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a chest pocket, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal earrings decorated with sparkly glass stones. Length 5 cm.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted polo shirt in ribbed jersey with a collar, button placket and short sleeves.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with gathered elastication at the front for a gently draped effect.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, coin pocket, front and back pockets and a slit at the front. Unlined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with elastication at the back and smocking at the front of the waist. Small, decorative metal appliqué at the top and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck with a lace trim at the top and adjustable spaghetti straps.
Straight-style shirt in linen with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Two-button jacket in a cotton weave with notch lapels, a decorative chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Jumper in a soft pointelle knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length circular skirt in sturdy satin with a regular waist and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves, a flock print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cashmere with a high collar, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

prod_name: D1 PE CHRIS SATIN SILK BLS
detail_desc: Straight-cut shirt in softly draping silk with a sheen. Relaxed fit with pointed lapels and a yoke with a bellows pleat at the back to create soft draping. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with adjustable buttoning.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Satin linings and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a square neckline and long puff sleeves. Unlined.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft jersey.
Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, and flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, block heels, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 4.5 cm.

Shirt in cotton with a collar, print motif on the chest and buttons down the front. Yoke with a hanger at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with buttons down the front. Narrow shoulder straps, a frill around the top and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Wide shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, concealed button placket at the front, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric in a relaxed fit with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets, and close-fitting ribbed hems with a zip.
Short, fitted dress in velour with a V-neck, draping with a knot detail at the front and long sleeves.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in twill made from a cotton blend with a high waist, detachable fabric belt, zip fly and button and zipped front pockets.
Running shorts in a double layer of fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Cold shoulder jumper in a ribbed cotton blend with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with metal buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the front of the top.
Trainers in mesh with a lightly padded edge and tongue. Jersey linings and insoles and fluted soles.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Push-up bras in lace and jersey with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jacket in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Card holder in grained imitation leather with two compartments on each side and one compartment at the top. Height 7 cm. Width 10 cm.

Lined shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a reflective strip on each leg, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in chunky mesh. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in jersey with a high, elasticated waist and a slit at the front.
Running vest top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, grosgrain button band with concealed buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved cardigan in a soft rib knit that is open at the front with ties.

Short dress in a crinkled, patterned weave with an opening at the front with twisted ties at the top. Decorative jacquard-weave trim around the neckline and down the front opening, a gathered seam at the waist and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Chokers. One made of narrow velvet ribbon and the other of heart-shaped metal links. Adjustable length, 27-38 cm.

Sandals with satin-covered heels and platform soles. Open toes and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 9.5 cm. The polyester content of the sandals is recycled.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with pointed toes and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 10 cm.
